trip.remarks: Met with Premier Múte Bourup Egede and Minister Broberg, together with Foreign Minister Kofod.

trip.remarks: Participated in President Biden’s bilateral engagements around the G7 Meeting.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Italian Prime Minister Mario Draghi and Italian President Sergio Mattarella. Also met and co-chaired a meeting of the Global Coalition to Defeat ISIS with Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio. Also met with Israeli Foreign Minister Yair Lapid.

trip.remarks: Met with Pope Francis, Holy See Secretary of State Cardinal Pietro Parolin, and Holy See Secretary for Relations with States Archbishop Paul Gallagher.

trip.remarks: Attended the G20 Foreign Ministers’ Meeting.

trip.remarks: Met with German Foreign Minister Heiko Maas and attended a Ministerial on Afghanistan.

trip.remarks: Chaired the Ministerial Council Meeting of the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development and met with French counterparts.

trip.remarks: Met with President Peter Pavel and Foreign Minister Jan Lipavský. Participated in an informal NATO Foreign Ministers Meeting.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Accompanied President Biden on his trip to Normandy and Paris to commemorate the 80th anniversary of D-Day and participate in his State Visit.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, Defense Minister Yoav Gallant, and other Israeli leaders.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Attended a conference on the urgent humanitarian response to Gaza, co-hosted by Jordan, Egypt, and the United Nations and met with King Abdullah II at the Dead Sea.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Amir Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani and Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Affairs Mohammed bin Abdulrahman Al Thani.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Accompanied President Biden to the G7 Leaders’ Summit.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Participated in the annual ASEAN-U.S. Post Ministerial Conference, 14th East Asia Summit Foreign Ministers’ Meeting, and the 31st ASEAN Regional Forum Foreign Ministers’ Meeting. Met with Director of the Chinese Communist Party Central Foreign Affairs Commission and Foreign Minister Wang Yi.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with President To Lam, Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh, and Foreign Minister Bui Thanh Son and paid his respects to the family of General Secretary Nguyễn Phú Trọng.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: With Secretary of Defense Lloyd J. Austin III, met with Japanese Foreign Minister Kamikawa Yoko and Japanese Defense Minister Kihara Minoru for a Foreign and Defense Ministerial (2+2) Dialogue and subsequently with Prime Minister Kishida Fumio. Met with Australian, Indian, and Japanese counterparts for a Quad Foreign Ministers’ Meeting.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: With Secretary of Defense Austin, met with President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. and with Secretary of Foreign Affairs Enrique Manalo and Secretary of National Defense Gilberto Teodoro for a 2+2 Ministerial Dialogue.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Lawrence Wong, Senior Minister Lee Hsien Loong, and Foreign Minister Vivian Balakrishnan.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with President Ukhnaaglin Khurelsukh, Prime Minister Oyun-Erdene Luvsannamsrai, Foreign Minister Battsetseg Batmunkh, and other Mongolian officials to reaffirm the importance of the U.S.-Mongolia Strategic Partnership.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Netanyahu, President Isaac Herzog, and Minister of Defense Yoav Gallant.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi and Foreign Minister Badr Abdelatty.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Minister of State Dr. Mohammed bin Abdulaziz Al-Khulaifi.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Transitional Presidential Council Coordinator Edgard Leblanc Fils and Prime Minister Garry Conille. Met with leadership of the Multinational Security Support mission.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with President Luis Abinader.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Keir Starmer and Foreign Secretary David Lammy. Opened the U.S.-UK Strategic Dialogue.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Traveled with UK Foreign Secretary David Lammy and met with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal, Foreign Minister Andrii Sybiha, and other senior Ukrainian government officials.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with President Andrzej Duda, Prime Minister Donald Tusk, and Foreign Minister Radosław Sikorski.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with President El-Sisi and co-chaired the opening of the U.S.-Egypt Strategic Dialogue with Foreign Minister Badr Abdelatty.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with President Emmanuel Macron. Secretary Blinken also met with French Foreign Minister Stéphane Séjourné, Italian Foreign Minister Antonio Tajani, and UK Foreign Secretary David Lammy to discuss the Middle East, Ukraine, and other shared priorities.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Participated in the East Asia Summit and the U.S.-ASEAN Summit.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with President Isaac Herzog and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman and Foreign Minister Faisal bin Farhan al Saud.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Mohammed bin Abdulrahman Al Thani and Amir Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Caretaker Lebanese Prime Minister Najib Mikati, United Arab Emirates Foreign Minister Abdullah Bin Zayed Al Nahyan, and Jordan’s Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates Ayman Safadi.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with NATO and European Union counterparts.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Joined President Biden at the annual Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Economic Leaders’ Week.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Attended the G20 Leaders’ Summit.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Attended the G7 Foreign Ministers’ Meeting.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Pope Francis, Secretary of State Cardinal Pietro Parolin, and Secretary for Relations with States Archbishop Paul Gallagher.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Attended the NATO Foreign Ministers’ Meeting.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Attended the 31st OSCE Ministerial Council Meeting and met with Prime Minister Robert Abela.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with met with King Abdullah II and Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates Ayman Safadi.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with President Recep Tayyip Erdogan and Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Mohammed Shiaa al-Sudani.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with King Abdullah II, the foreign ministers of the Arab Contact Group on Syria, and UN Special Envoy for Syria Geir Pederson.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Acting President Choi Sang-mok and Foreign Minister Cho Tae-yul.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Ishiba Shigeru and Foreign Minister Iwaya Takeshi.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with President Emmanuel Macron and Foreign Minister Jean-Noël Barrot.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with European counterparts to discuss the situation in Syria.

trip.name: Antony John Blinken
trip.remarks: Met with Vatican officials.
